definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

pinyin: ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种智能仪表交互界面的软件开发自动化技术。

sentences.english: This measure may indicate problems in the software development process.
sentences.chinese: 这个测量可以指示在软件开发过程中的问题。

sentences.english: How much money would that need given software development costs today?
sentences.chinese: 那么，今天需要付出的软件开发成本会是多少呢？

sentences.english: Development governance encompasses the software development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 开发治理围绕着软件开发生命周期。

sentences.english: Zhongguancun Science Park is the largest software development and production center in China.
sentences.chinese: 中关村科技园区是全球最大的软件开发和生产中心。

sentences.english: There is NO software development without creativity.
sentences.chinese: 没有创造力就没有软件开发。

sentences.english: The Agile Software Development is a newly arisen kind of software development in recent year.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷开发方法是近年来新兴的一种软件开发方法。

sentences.english: Here I introduce the recent emergence of a Lean application to software development.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我介绍最近出现的一种软件开发精益应用。

sentences.english: Many aspects of software development can be modelled in some kind of executable process language.
sentences.chinese: 软件开发的很多方面可以用某种可执行过程语言建模。

sentences.english: This paper contents software development of PLC and PC.
sentences.chinese: 本文的研究工作还包括上位机和下位机的软件开发。

sentences.english: This initiative will drive the adoption of one or more software development capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 这个开端将会趋势采用一个或多个软件开发能力。

sentences.english: It adopts the thought of component-based development in the specific implementation.
sentences.chinese: 在模型的具体实施上采用了基于组件的软件开发思想。

sentences.english: Non-engineers often don't understand software development, and view it as a black-box art.
sentences.chinese: 非技术人员通常不懂软件开发，视它为黑盒技术。

sentences.english: Are there any aspects of software development that cannot be off-shored?
sentences.chinese: 软件开发中有无法外包的工作吗？

sentences.english: He obtained a Ph.D. in physics before starting a career in software development.
sentences.chinese: 在开始他的软件开发生涯之前获得了物理学博士学位。

sentences.english: Ashraf has a background in software development and network infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 阿什拉夫在软件开发和网络基础设施方面有专业特长。

pinyin: ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2
